mapper.select: (SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064') UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064')) t ORDER BY code, date desc) union all (SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100')) t ORDER BY code, date asc) union all (SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT case code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100')) t ORDER BY code, date desc) union all (select code, string_agg(value, ',') as value, '1' as typ from ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (code, value) code, value FROM ( SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064') UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.epn_id = #{epn} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064')) t ORDER BY code, value) t2 group by code)

(SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code not in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019')) t ORDER BY code, date desc) union all (SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when 'P000099' then 'P000091' when 'P000100' then 'P000092' else code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT case code when 'P000093' then 'P000085' when 'P000094' then 'P000086' when 'P000095' then 'P000087' when 'P000096' then 'P000088' when 'P000097' then 'P000089' when 'P000098' then 'P000090' when ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100')) t ORDER BY code, date asc) union all (SELECT DISTINCT ON (code) code, value, '0' as typ FROM ( SELECT case b.code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else b.code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id INNER JOIN (select code, count(*) cnt from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems} and code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') group by code) as c on b.code = c.code where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' and cnt > 1 UNION ALL SELECT case b.code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else b.code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id INNER JOIN (select code, count(*) cnt from vl_ems_va_hist where ems_id = #{ems} and code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') group by code) as c on b.code = c.code where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and cnt > 1 UNION ALL SELECT case b.code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else b.code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id INNER JOIN (select code, count(*) cnt from vl_ems_tra_hist where ems_id = #{ems} and code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') group by code) as c on b.code = c.code where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and b.cancel = 'N' and cnt > 1 UNION ALL SELECT case b.code when 'P000085' then 'P000093' when 'P000086' then 'P000094' when 'P000087' then 'P000095' when 'P000088' then 'P000096' when 'P000089' then 'P000097' when 'P000090' then 'P000098' when 'P000091' then 'P000099' when 'P000092' then 'P000100' else b.code end, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id INNER JOIN (select code, count(*) cnt from vl_ems_signal_hist where ems_id = #{ems} and code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') group by code) as c on b.code = c.code where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P000085','P000086','P000087','P000088','P000089','P000090','P000091','P000092','P000093', 'P000094','P000095','P000096','P000097','P000098','P000099','P000100') and cnt > 1) t ORDER BY code, date desc) union all (select code, string_agg(value, ',') as value, '1' as typ from ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (code, value) code, value FROM ( SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_sa_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_va_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019') UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_tra_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019') and b.cancel = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT code, value, date FROM vl_ems_event a INNER JOIN vl_ems_signal_hist b on a.ems_id = b.ems_id where a.ems_id = #{ems} and b.code in ('P001061','P001023','P001025','P001026','P001028','P002016','P002021','P002034','P003018','P000064','P000166','P004017','P004018','P004019')) t ORDER BY code, value) t2 group by code)
